message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Hey Alice, $140 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $130.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135. What do you think?
